meanings.definition: Large, biting flies that are often found near horses.
meanings.sent1: The horseflies buzzed around the horses in the field.
meanings.sent2: I got a painful bite from a horsefly while riding my horse.
meanings.sent3: The horseflies seemed to enjoy bothering the horses, almost like a game.
meanings.sent4: The horseflies attacked with such force, it felt like tiny needles piercing my skin.
meanings.sent5: The image of the horseflies swarming the horses stayed with me for days.

meanings.definition: A type of insect known for its painful bite.
meanings.sent1: Horseflies can leave quite a painful mark on your skin.
meanings.sent2: I always carry insect repellent to keep horseflies away during picnics.
meanings.sent3: The horseflies seemed to have a personal vendetta against me, targeting only me for their bites.
meanings.sent4: The horseflies' bite felt like a burning sensation, unlike any other insect.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the horseflies' painful sting made me wary of going near them again.
